pyqgis_plugin.name: Raster to GPKG converter
pyqgis_plugin.description: This plugin converts any raster to a GeoPackage. It builds also the piramids.
pyqgis_plugin.about: This plugin is an internal PCA QGIS plugin that converts any raster to a new GeoPackage raster layer with calculated piramids.
pyqgis_plugin.tags: PCA, raster, piramids, gpkg, conversion. orthophoto

pyqgis_plugin.name: PCA Geomax Survey Processing
pyqgis_plugin.description: PCA Geomax Survey Processing is an internal QGIS Plugin specifically built for PCA survey data management and processing purposes.
pyqgis_plugin.about:
PCA Geomax Survey Processing is an internal QGIS Plugin specifically built for PCA survey data management and processing purposes.
It is a component of the new DRS/GIS integrated data management system, and it is based both on the new Geomax codelist system and on the raw survey data exported in shapefile format.
The current version of the plugin is compatible with the Geomax codelist version draft v 4.2. A dedicated help in the toolbar provides more inforamtions and detailed use procedure.

pyqgis_plugin.name: Evaluation Trenches Generator
pyqgis_plugin.description: This plugin provide a set of tools to generates trenches for archaeological evaluations.
pyqgis_plugin.about: This plugin provide a set of tools to generates trenches for archaeological evaluations and to generate the necessary files to configurate the GNSS setout.
pyqgis_plugin.tags: PCA, python, archaeology, evaluation, trench, setout

pyqgis_plugin.name: PCA Post-excavation
pyqgis_plugin.description: PCA Post-excavation is an internal QGIS Plugin specifically built for the PCA post-excavation phase.
pyqgis_plugin.about:
PCA Post-excavation is an internal QGIS Plugin specifically built for the PCA post-excavation phase.
It is a component of the new DRS/GIS integrated data management system, and provides a set of tools that help definings groups, entities, periods, sub-periods and phases for all the archeological features.
pyqgis_plugin.tags: PCA, python, archaeology, post-excavation, phasing, grouping, periods

pyqgis_plugin.name: Snap Point
pyqgis_plugin.description: This plugin snaps a selected point to the closest point of a feature from a defined layer.
pyqgis_plugin.about: This plugin snaps a selected point to the closest point of a feature from a defined layer. It can be used during survey Processing to snap Drawing Points to sections or Archaeological features.

pyqgis_plugin.name: Snap Line
pyqgis_plugin.description: This plugin snaps a selected line to the closest points of a feature from a defined layer.
pyqgis_plugin.about: This plugin snaps a selected line to the closest points of a feature from a defined layer. It can be used during survey Processing to snap Sections to Archaeological features.

pyqgis_plugin.name: PCA DRS Context Checks
pyqgis_plugin.description: This is an internal QGIS Plugin that provides a quick access to a array of queries built for check the PCA DRS Spreadsheet during the post-excavation phase.
pyqgis_plugin.about: This plugin provides a quick access to an array of queries built for check the PCA DRS Context spreadsheet during the post-excavation phase. It is a component of the new DRS/GIS integrated data management system. It provides a dockable panel that allows to run some checks, as missing context sheets, duplicated context numbers and recorded features not matching the site plan.
pyqgis_plugin.tags: PCA, DRS, spreadsheet, postexcavation, checks, duplicates

pyqgis_plugin.name: Search Value
pyqgis_plugin.description: A dock widget for searching values on the layers attribute table and for zooming on the relative geometries on the map.
pyqgis_plugin.about: This plugin opens a dock widget that allows searching a value on a layer attribute table. When a value is found, the tool zooms to the relative geometry on the map.

pyqgis_plugin.name: PCA Report Generator
pyqgis_plugin.description: The plugin provides a dockable environment to help generate quick features description from DRS data that can be used on the report.
pyqgis_plugin.about: PCA Report Description is an internal QGIS Plugin specifically built for the PCA post-excavation phase and can be considered as a component of the new DRS/GIS integrated data management system. The plugin provides a dockable environment to help generate quick features description from DRS data that can be used on the report. The feature(s) that wants to be described can be recalled by choosing the value (context number or group name) from a dropdown list, or simply by selecting them in the map.
pyqgis_plugin.tags: python, PCA, report, groups, attribute table, string, description, DRS

pyqgis_plugin.name: PCA DRS Context Sheet Printer
pyqgis_plugin.description: This plugin generate a online version of a recording sheet (context, cremation, skeleton)ready for printing.
pyqgis_plugin.about: PCA DRS Context Sheet Printer is an internal QGIS Plugin specifically built for the PCA post-excavation phase and can be considered as a component of the new DRS/GIS integrated data management system. This plugin generate a online version of a recording sheet (context, cremation, skeleton) ready for printing.

pyqgis_plugin.name: Check Duplicated Features
pyqgis_plugin.description: This plugin checks for duplicated features on a layer.
pyqgis_plugin.about: This plugin checks for duplicated features on a layer. Optionally, you can increment the check's factors (e.g. geometry and attribute value). After the check is possible to decide if immediately delete the features result of the check.

pyqgis_plugin.name: Geopackage to SHP Exporter
pyqgis_plugin.description: This plugin exports each layer contained in a Geopackage to a separate shapefile.
pyqgis_plugin.about: This plugin exports each layer contained in a Geopackage to a separate shapefile. Empty and no-geometric layers will be discarded.

pyqgis_plugin.name: Add Save All Edits Shortcut
pyqgis_plugin.description: This plugin add a shortcut for quick access to the option Save Edits for All Layers.
pyqgis_plugin.about: This plugin add a shortcut for quick access to the option Save Edits for All Layers.
